title: Can I apply for a B.Ed along with a BA? I am a second year student. - Quora

response.answer_text: Recently Government has launched a new policy that one can pursue two degrees simultaneously. The conditions need to be fulfilled that, one of the degree should be regular and other should be distance. BUT, I am not pretty sure as in your case, because BEd is a professional degree and pursuing a Professional course with normal degree course seems to be Unrealistic. Still you can search the Latest Guidelines regarding the issue. UGC Dual Degree: Students can now pursue 2 degree courses simultaneously Students can now pursue 2 degree courses simultaneously - Times of India ► This is a news article from TOI Published at that time.
No you cannot. You need a bachelor's degree for B.ed. You must have proof that you completed your bachelor's degree at the time of admission.
